Texts.Chs: 在^orange;采集工作台^reset;处制造^orange;灯笼杆^reset;并带给^green;韦尔奇^reset;
Texts.Eng: Craft a ^green;Lantern Stick^reset; at the ^orange;Foraging Table^reset; and return to ^green;Welchie^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 现在你不用拿手电筒瞎照了，把它带在身上然后旅行！而且，我在仓库找到一些^orange;植物纤维^reset;。你不拿去？
Texts.Eng: Now you'll be able to slap that on your head and travel without needing to hold a flashlight! Also, I found some ^orange;Plant Fibre^reset; in storage. Why don't you take it?

Sometimes, the darkness can prove a horrible hindrance. That's where tha ^orange;Oil^reset; I got ya ter make comes in: You can craft a ^orange;Lantern Stick^reset; to see in the dark at a ^orange;Foraging Table^reset;. ^green;Research^reset; into ^orange;Agriculture^reset; to learn how.
Texts.Chs: 有时，黑暗会成为一种可怕的障碍。那是个^orange;充满油^reset;的地方。我让你来做：你可以做一个^orange;灯笼杆^reset;在黑暗中看^orange;采集工作台^reset;学习如何^green;研究^reset;^orange;农业^reset;。
